name: Endava
tag_list: software, offshore, offshoring, outsourcing, media, project-mangement
overview:
Endava is a leading Eastern European IT Development Outsourcing company, with Offshore Delivery Centres in Romania and Moldova. Endava teams deliver the full project lifecycle, from application delivery and testing through to support, hosting and managed services for some of the worldâ€™s leading financial services, telecommunications, sports and media companies.

Key Facts And Figures

Endava is a privately owned IT services company established in 2000. With over 700 full time employees, Endava is currently based in 7 locations across the UK, USA, Romania and Moldova. With an annual turnover of Â£23,000,000 and growth projections of over 25% per annum, the company has established itself as a leading IT services provider. In 2010, Endava were listed at No 17 in The Sunday Times Tech Track 100, as well as featuring in the Guardians Tech Media Invest Top 100 as one of the UKâ€™s most innovative companies. Endava is also ranked in the NMA awards as the No1 technical agency. Endava have also achieved rankings in the Deloitte Technology Fast 500 EMEA 2010 program.
